mapper.select: SELECT qr.quadrangle_id, qr.name, ST_AsGeoJson(ST_Simplify(geog::GEOMETRY, 0.001)::GEOGRAPHY, 3) AS geojson FROM quadrangle AS qr WHERE qr.scale = 250000 ORDER BY name
mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT qr.quadrangle_id, qr.name, qr.alt_name, qr.abbr, qr.alt_abbr, qr.scale FROM quadrangle AS qr JOIN quadrangle_geog AS qg ON qg.quadrangle_id = qr.quadrangle_id
mapper.select: JOIN borehole_geog AS bg ON ST_intersects(bg.geog, qg.geog) JOIN borehole AS bh ON bh.borehole_id = bg.borehole_id WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{prospect_id} AND qr.scale = 250000
JOIN borehole_geog AS bg ON ST_intersects(bg.geog, qg.geog) WHERE bg.borehole_id = #{borehole_id} AND qr.scale = 250000
JOIN well_geog AS wg ON ST_Intersects(wg.geog, qg.geog) WHERE wg.well_id = #{well_id} AND qr.scale = 250000
JOIN outcrop_geog AS og ON ST_Intersects(og.geog, qg.geog) WHERE og.outcrop_id = #{outcrop_id} AND qr.scale = 250000
JOIN shotline_geog AS sg ON ST_Intersects(sg.geog, qg.geog) WHERE sg.shotline_id = #{shotline_id} AND qr.scale = 250000
